name: War of the Broses
description:
28/1/19  - Single room draft version is up! I'm hoping to flesh out and complete the rest of the game throughout this week before the showcase weekend.

Controls:

Gamepad - Left Analogue Stick to move, 'A' (bottom) button to lift and throw.

Keyboard - Arrow keys to move, spacebar to lift and throw.

Premise:

Lifting any object gives you a boost to your strength. Lift enough objects to be able to escape the room, but be careful of the...mimics? They'll knock you about and waste your time. Yeah I ran out of time for an actual AI to compete against, so here we are!
